author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
Every iteration of Batman on screen has brought with it a distinct interpretation of the Dark Knight's batsuit, and Tim Burton's Batman from 1989 has perhaps one of the most iconic. Adam Savage gets up close with one of the last surviving hero batsuits from the film, in astounding condition that reveals so many details we didn't know about the costume. 

Learn more about the upcoming Propstore EMLA: Los Angeles summer 2025 auction at https://propstoreauction.com/auctions/info/id/456

Shot by Joey Fameli and edited by Norman Chan
Music by Jinglepunks

title: Adam Savage Meets Batman (1989)'s Original Batsuit!
